Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg advocated for human rights and equality, stood up for the rights of women, and so much more.

Now, everything she fought for is in jeopardy.

Republicans are trying to roll back Americans’ rights by replacing her with someone who will undo her legacy.
Today, I joined @SenWarren in urging the administration to stop supporting a lawsuit to strike down the Affordable Care Act. It's unconscionable, especially during a pandemic. And it has to stop.

Tearing down the Affordable Care Act has been one of Republicans’ top priorities for more than a decade.

They've tried 70 times to repeal or roll back the ACA in Congress.

Now, they're rushing through Trump's Supreme Court nominee to ensure it finally happens.

Say it with me: the Senate should be passing the House’s COVID-19 relief bill to help the American people, not rushing to confirm a Supreme Court justice so they can gut access to health care during a pandemic.

At a time when leadership from the Oval Office is the difference between life or death in a way that was unfathomable at this point last year, the American people are ready to welcome decency and compassion back to our White House. 

That’s who @JoeBiden has always been. #vote http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1319058640712642560/img/gBAcR1WHwa6kABMt.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1319058640712642560/vid/480x270/bwoxn9Vv8epw2UP7.mp4?tag=13

When a president is compromised, our national interests are compromised. #vote http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1319042905626083329/pu/img/trC__lwq71EluRVM.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1319042905626083329/pu/vid/480x270/Wtg4O0JqH8OcCtNw.mp4?tag=10

Help is on the way for the American people. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1319019981154156551/pu/img/9AXmW9JebpOMO-zo.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1319019981154156551/pu/vid/480x270/O9ihWzkuR-ZIjBDT.mp4?tag=10

Security sector violence against civilians is not new—in 2017, I wrote to the State Department expressing concern about the sale of weapons to Nigeria’s military. The attack on peaceful protestors last night by Nigerian soldiers demands a review of US military sales to Nigeria.

Nigerians are protesting abuse at the hands of police & I stand with them. In order to be a vibrant & respected democracy, the Nigerian government should protect the rights of peaceful protestors & investigate the violence committed against them. https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/nigerian-protesters-say-security-forces-fired-on-them-amid-growing-global-outrage/2020/10/21/3b6dd1f6-1375-11eb-a258-614acf2b906d_story.html
